doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 40 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 10/28/1986] [3]--Dr. Farkle
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 40 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 10/28/1986] [3]--Dr. Farkle

SAN FRANCISCO EDITION OF 231.0709
Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Atlanta, City Council defeats attempt to repeal a gay rights clause in city's Bill of Rights2. Voting underway to change federal prohibitions on rape to be defined as sexual assault on another person, regardless of sex or age, and including spouse-on-spouse assault3. $111,000 from a benefactor's will to go to Lambda legal defense and education and the Human Rights Fund4. California gubernatorial candidate Tom Bradley turns toward the gay vote5. Hollywood stars lend their support to a "No on 64" labor rally6. Call for public access channel KQED to broadcast more gay-oriented programming7. AIDS PSA television spots begin airing on San Francisco CBS affiliate8. Virginia Appuzo named by Governor Cuomo as vice-chair of the New York State AIDS Advisory CouncilCOMMERCIAL: Shanti Project featuring Mikhail Baryshnikov9. Research for an AIDS vaccine estimated at $1.6 billion10. Notre Dame University rules against a gay-oriented student committee11. US Attorney General encourages AIDS education for elementary school children, with reactions from San Franciscans12. Supreme Court petitioned by the Gay Games to their right to use the word "Olympic"13. West Hollywood mayoral race is plagued by scandals14. Interview with Pat Norman, candidate for Supervisor15. Weekly commentary from Sally Gearhart on Measure M and development of downtown San Francisco16. News reporter Jane Dornacker dies in helicopter crash during a live broadcast17. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. AnnouncementsCOMMERCIAL: Shanti Project, featuring Cynthia Harvey2. Interview with author and wiccan, Zsuzsanna Budapest3. Clips from stage show, "The Nightclub of the Living Dead"4. This Week in Gay History with Jeff Bixby5. Fundraiser announcement6. Movie Reviews, Halloween-themed7. Performance by San Francisco's Gay Men's Chorus' barbershop quartet8. "Ask Dr Farkle" segment about hitting on lesbians9. S Diana Bogus reads Edgar Allen Poe's "The Raven" over the closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 40 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 10/28/1986] [3]--Dr. Farkle: October 1986
